blog.name: angry-snail
blog.title: Angry Snail
blog.description:
My blog for Angry Snail, my Composer/Sound Design pseudonym!
Here I will be keeping a journal of my work and posting music and other things I work on!

summary: After finding a sound font for Pokémon Emerald and listening to copious amounts of RWBY music in excitement for the new volume,...
caption:
After finding a sound font for Pokémon Emerald and listening to copious amounts of RWBY music in excitement for the new volume, I decided to mash the two together to create battle themes for each of the main girls, utilising their themes in as pokémon-y a way as possible.

This first one is for our girl Ruby. The start is typical pokémon ‘doodle-doo doodle-doo doodle-doo doodle-doo’ before going into Ruby’s motif, Red Like Roses. This briefly transforms into Red Like Roses Part II (One of my fave songs in the whole 5 albums of OST). I decided to remove a few of the pauses to make it flow smoother, but I also went straight ahead to get the bridge part in there alongside the verse and chorus parts, only because I love that bridge so much!

Anyway, I hope some people find amusement in this and I’ll be making more for the other three (Weiss next, looking forward to using all those Mirror Mirror parts!!!)

trail.content:
After finding a sound font for Pokémon Emerald and listening to copious amounts of RWBY music in excitement for the new volume, I decided to mash the two together to create battle themes for each of the main girls, utilising their themes in as pokémon-y a way as possible.

This first one is for our girl Ruby. The start is typical pokémon ‘doodle-doo doodle-doo doodle-doo doodle-doo’ before going into Ruby’s motif, Red Like Roses. This briefly transforms into Red Like Roses Part II (One of my fave songs in the whole 5 albums of OST). I decided to remove a few of the pauses to make it flow smoother, but I also went straight ahead to get the bridge part in there alongside the verse and chorus parts, only because I love that bridge so much!

Anyway, I hope some people find amusement in this and I’ll be making more for the other three (Weiss next, looking forward to using all those Mirror Mirror parts!!!)

summary: POKEBUSTERS NEEDS YOU!
title: POKEBUSTERS NEEDS YOU!
body:
Hey guys! I’d like to enlist your help.

Someone reuploaded the PokeBusters video on twitter without proper credit and its WAY surpassed the views on the original YT upload. 

The reupload:

The original (and official YT video released by Mashed )

I wont be linking the reuploads twitter because i dont wish for the person to get bullied, the issue has been confronted but im hoping to help do a little damage control.

 As a content creator, I gotta say this is a prime example as to how reuploading (without credit no less) can really hurt artists. Reuploding/reposting content HURTS creators guys. With the same token, please dont go scouting out the reuploader to harass them, that is NOT what this post is about. 

 We WANT to make free content for our audiences but we cannot continue to do so when this like this continue to happen. I wont go into a rant, but this is where I’m hoping I can get some help.

If you have some spare time, PLEASE go and watch and comment on the official YouTube release (not just through tumblr, but ACTUALLY on the youtube page although the more views anywhere the better) 

And to show appreciation to the people that brought this video to life, please consider checking out and/or following the team:

https://twitter.com/AcHeJesus -The Animator who worked TIRELESSLY to meet that Halloween deadline. THAT SPECTACULAR, DELICIOUS, CRISPY YUMMY ANIMATION

https://twitter.com/zeedox– the AMAZING background artist who REALLY captured the spooky environment

https://twitter.com/AlexWalkerSmith– that fantastic music you hear? THAT S O N G ?!?! THIS GUY DID IT!

https://twitter.com/mashed– and then of course, MASHED themselves who came to me to get permission to put all of this together! literally you guys would not HAVE this video without them!!!

I don’t normally make posts asking for views, but since I was not the only artist working on this team, I really want to see this delightful group get the recognition they deserve. 

And for fun, let em know Kitty sent ya~! ;D
